title: Satellite imaging company Iceye raises $93 million in latest funding round
key_assets: ['SAR satellite constellation', 'satellite manufacturing facility in Irvine, California', 'R&D lab', 'mission operations center']
summary: Finnish satellite company ICEYE has raised $93 million in a new funding round led by Finnish sovereign wealth fund Solidium Oy, with participation from other investors. The funds will be used to expand business operations, develop new products and services, and support the company's growth trajectory toward free cash flow break-even.
why_it_matters: This funding round underscores investor confidence in ICEYE's SAR satellite technology and commercial potential. The investment will enable ICEYE to accelerate its expansion, product development, and satellite deployment, reinforcing its position in the global satellite imaging market.
